title: GABRIEL 2: Ransomed Love
description: Ensnared in his debt to the Sanitini family, Gabe struggles to keep his “club” family oblivious to these new events governing his life.  But when Quinton takes it upon himself to make a “preemptive” strike on one of Gabe’s friends as proof of what he’s capable of if Gabe steps out of line, the stakes are raised. And it is no longer Cole alone who is now in Quinton’s crosshairs – but everyone Gabe loves and cares for.  In a twisted game of revenge and obsession – will love be the ultimate sacrifice?
author: C.J. Bishop
